banner.title: Everyday Better, the app that boosts your habits.
banner.subtitle: Track your progress and become a better version of yourself. Try it for free!

features.title: Track anything you want
features.subtitle: Everyday Better is completely flexible. You can track what's important to you and easily customize it to your needs.

card1.title: Reminder Notifications
card1.text: Notifications remind users to complete their regular tasks and help them maintain their habits.

card2.title: Custom Goals
card2.text: Users can define their own activities and track the ones that matter most to them.

card3.title: Progress Tracking
card3.text: A visual dashboard helps users stay motivated with clear feedback on their progress.
